contactId.title: contactId
contactId.description: The Contact ID to generate support cases for. This should be extracted from the user's context or request. Cases will be linked to this contact and inherit the account relationship.

caseCount.title: caseCount
caseCount.description: The number of support cases to generate (e.g., 3, 5, 10). Extract this from user phrases like 'Generate 5 cases', 'Create 3 support tickets', 'Make 8 service cases'.

industry.title: industry
industry.description: The industry type for generating relevant support cases (e.g., 'technology', 'healthcare', 'financial services', 'retail', 'manufacturing', 'SaaS'). Extract this from user phrases like 'tech industry cases', 'healthcare support tickets', 'fintech service cases'.
